title: Master of Movement
description: Learn and master the art of movement (use WASD).

title: Dragon Slayer
description: Defeat the Dragon terrorizing the nearby village.

title: Royal Messenger
description: Deliver a message to the Queen in the neighboring kingdom.

title: Herbalist's Request
description: Collect 10 rare herbs for the local healer.

title: City's Secret
description: Investigate the mysterious disappearances in the city.

title: Goblin Defense
description: Protect the village from an incoming goblin raid.

title: Lost Pet
description: Find and return the lost pet of the town's blacksmith.

title: Brewmaster's Aid
description: Help the local innkeeper gather ingredients for a special brew.

title: Forest's Curse
description: Explore the haunted forest and find the source of its curse.
